content.question: Which of the following examples best represents altruism?

choices.label: Booker stops to help someone even though it puts him in danger.
Darby helps his boss in order to get some overtime pay.
Josie forms a study group to hold herself accountable for studying.
Sammy helps a friend move because the friend previously helped Sammy move.

content.answer: Booker stops to help someone even though it puts him in danger.
